name: Kielbasa for the Big Game
author: Salads4me
summary: This is a great party appetizer that you can make in your slow cooker. I make it every year for the Big Game and it disappears. The ingredients sound like something a child would put together but truly it tastes great. This is an appetizer so it could feed less or more depending on the size of your football fans.
ingredients: 4 pounds kielbasa (Polish) sausage (such as Hillshire Farm®), cut into 1/2 inch pieces
directions: Place the kielbasa into a slow cooker
Add the grape jelly and barbeque sauce
Cook on Medium until hot, about 2 hours
